section.title: Wait a minute
section.para: Did you see "The Passion"? Whether you found the film inspiring or not, or you didn't see it at all -- If you want to find out more about the passion of Jesus Christ, you can visit the "the good news" webpages. It has more information ready for you, maybe even in your local language.
